name: Fiberglass Claw Hammer 16oz
description: Professional-grade 16oz claw hammer with fiberglass handle for reduced vibration and increased durability.

name: Carpenter's Pencil 12-Pack
description: Flat carpenter's pencils designed for marking wood, concrete, and other construction materials. Pack of 12.

name: 2x4 Lumber 8ft Premium Grade
description: Kiln-dried 2x4 dimensional lumber, 8 feet long. Premium grade for framing and construction projects.

name: 20V Cordless Power Drill
description: Powerful 20V lithium-ion cordless drill with 2-speed transmission, LED light, and 1/2-inch chuck. Includes battery and charger.

name: Professional Tape Measure 25ft
description: Heavy-duty 25-foot tape measure with magnetic tip, auto-lock, and belt clip. Blade width 1-inch.

name: Safety Glasses Clear Lens
description: ANSI Z87.1 rated safety glasses with clear polycarbonate lenses. Anti-scratch and anti-fog coating.

name: Heavy Duty Work Gloves Large
description: Durable leather palm work gloves with reinforced fingertips. Size Large. Machine washable.

name: Torpedo Level 9-inch
description: Compact 9-inch torpedo level with 3 vials (horizontal, vertical, 45-degree). Magnetic base and V-groove edge.

name: Screwdriver Set 32-Piece
description: Complete 32-piece screwdriver set including Phillips, flathead, Torx, and hex drivers. Magnetic tips with comfort grip handles.

name: Box of Nails 2-inch (5lb)
description: 5-pound box of 2-inch common nails. Bright finish, ideal for framing and general construction.
